verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>. Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> that feareth <S%H3372><s%> Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>, That delighteth <S%H2654><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%> in his commandments <S%H4687><s%>.
His seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be mighty <S%H1368><s%> upon earth <S%H776><s%>: The generation <S%H1755><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%>.
Wealth <S%H1952><s%> and riches <S%H6239><s%> are in his house <S%H1004><s%>; And his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> endureth <S%H5975><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>.
Unto the upright <S%H3477><s%> there ariseth <S%H2224><s%> light <S%H216><s%> in the darkness <S%H2822><s%>: He is gracious <S%H2587><s%>, and merciful <S%H7349><s%>, and righteous <S%H6662><s%>.
Well <S%H2896><s%> is it with the man <S%H376><s%> that dealeth graciously <S%H2603><s%> and lendeth <S%H3867><s%>; He shall maintain <S%H3557><s%> his cause <S%H1697><s%> in judgment <S%H4941><s%>.
For he shall never <S%H5769><s%> be moved <S%H4131><s%>; The righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be had in everlasting <S%H5769><s%> remembrance <S%H2143><s%>.
He shall not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%> tidings <S%H8052><s%>: His heart <S%H3820><s%> is fixed <S%H3559><s%>, trusting <S%H982><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
His heart <S%H3820><s%> is established <S%H5564><s%>, he shall not be afraid <S%H3372><s%>, Until he see <S%H7200><s%> his desire upon his adversaries <S%H6862><s%>.

He hath dispersed <S%H6340><s%>, he hath given <S%H5414><s%> to the needy <S%H34><s%>; His righteousness <S%H6666><s%> endureth <S%H5975><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>: His horn <S%H7161><s%> shall be exalted <S%H7311><s%> with honor <S%H3519><s%>.

The wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H3707><s%>, and be grieved; He shall gnash <S%H2786><s%> with his teeth <S%H8127><s%>, and melt away <S%H4549><s%>: The desire <S%H8378><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%>.
